title: We frequently see news stories of corrupt officials being caught red handed by ACB/CBI/Vigilance etc. They get their 2-minutes of shame in the media. Wonder how the family feels about such public shaming?
selftext: I am sure the 'corrupt' officials have families and relatives too. Wonder how they deal with such public shaming?
comments: Probably they would know that someday he would be caught, and maintain that he was framed ?
Corruption is endemic so half the times they would probably consider it bragging rights

> and maintain that he was framed ?

Yes, rally around the guilty!

>Yes, rally around the guilty!

Yeah, what else could they do ? They would have enjoyed the perks, right ?
